note.p: Army officer. Son of the Rev. Robert Augustus Johnson, a member of the Lunar Society. Of Witham Hall, Lincolnshire. Married Lucy Foster of Dowsby, Lincolnshire, in 1835.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/2095/530/1)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 14 June 2021)
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 14 June 2021)
